Text:
Some links were deleted from description. For complete instructions and support visit
http://olarila.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=27&t=2197
Hey Dude ,I have a problem,My PC Freezes in "System uptime in nanoseconds= 'some random numbers' " .,So what should i do

How do ypu proceed, guys, when you boot from USB ?
I followed the instructions, enter the BIOS, boot from USB HDD, but nothing happent.
Windows is booting up.
What am i doing wrong ??
Use topic in my first comment for support, post full hardware specs.

"Install boot loader to the HD"
I installed clover ... does not boot. I installed chameleon ... always kernel panic ... any ideas?

Next step, "Install essential and other kexts you may need".

Did you install *essential kexts* (FakeSMC, NullCPUPowerManagement)?
